description:
Kyosuke spots Madoka leaving a building with a man in the morning and discussing their long night together, so Kyosuke decides he can also be adventurous with a new friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Adult Relationship!? Madoka Secretly Returns Home in the Morning
Otona no Kankei!? Madoka Himitsu no Asagaeri
大人の関係!? まどか秘密の朝帰り
